titleStmt.title: Tradidi vobis, or, The traditionary conveyance of faith cleer'd in the rational way against the exceptions of a learned opponent / by J.B., Esquire.
titleStmt.author: J. B. (John Belson), fl. 1688.

notesStmt.note: Written by J. Belson. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in British Library.
